passed_checks.check_name: Containers should not share the host IPC namespace
code_block:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: s09s12-web
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels: { app: s09s12-web }
  template:
    metadata:
      labels: { app: s09s12-web }
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: web
          image: s09s12-app:latest # intentionally 'latest'
          ports: [{ containerPort: 8080 }]
          securityContext:
            runAsUser: 0            # intentionally root
          resources: {}             # no limits/requests
